user_stories.title: As a user, I want to repository & ci/cd setup
user_stories.description: Create new Git repository, configure basic CI/CD pipeline for automated builds and tests.
acceptance_criteria: Given the user needs Repository & CI/CD Setup
Then Create new Git repository, configure basic CI/CD pipeline for automated builds and tests.

user_stories.title: As a user, I want to core service scaffolding
user_stories.description: Generate initial application structure for the main service(s) based on chosen tech stack (e.g., Python/Flask, Node.js/Express, Java/Spring Boot).
acceptance_criteria: Given the user needs Core Service Scaffolding
Then Generate initial application structure for the main service(s) based on chosen tech stack (e.g., Python/Flask, Node.js/Express, Java/Spring Boot).

user_stories.title: As a user, I want to database integration (initial)
user_stories.description: Set up initial database schema and connection, including ORM/ODM configuration if applicable. This will be a basic connection with no complex tables initially.
acceptance_criteria: Given the user needs Database Integration (Initial)
Then Set up initial database schema and connection, including ORM/ODM configuration if applicable. This will be a basic connection with no complex tables initially.
